titleStmt.title: The boke of knowledge whether a sycke person beynge in perylle, shall lyue, or dye. &c.
titleStmt.author: Hippocrates, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Robert Wyer: dwellynge at the sygne of saynte John̄ Euangelyste in saynt Martyns parysshe, in the Duke of Suffolkes rentes besyde Charynge Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
